title: The “Make Mexico Great Again” Edition
description:
David Plotz, Emily Bazelon and John
Dickerson discuss Donald Trump's visit to Mexico, the breakup of Huma
Abedin and Anthony Weiner, and the Senate races of 2016.

podcasts, and more. Sign up for a free trial today at
